1370: Lieuin moved to Potstraet.B.3 after marriage.
Got married to Nellen at age 23 in 1370.
Had a daughter with Nellen, Moerseil, at age 23.
1371: Had a son with Nellen, Curdiin, at age 24.
1373: Lost son Curdiin when Curdiin was 3 years old.
1376: Had a son with Nellen, Reynold, at age 29.
1378: Had a daughter with Nellen, Walburgis, at age 31.
1379: Had a daughter with Nellen, Imma, at age 32.
1380: Had a daughter with Nellen, Machtilden, at age 33.
1381: Had a son with Nellen, Goeskin, at age 34.
1384: Had a son with Nellen, Mourin, at age 37.
Lost son Mourin when Mourin was 1 years old.
1392: Lost daughter Imma when Imma was 14 years old.
Has seen several of their children die.
